it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class PlayerBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.PlayerBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PlayerBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Player Board class This board is held by every player in the game and contains the used Window Pattern card
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String color
      Board color There is no setter for this attribute, as it is given in the constructor
      private static java.util.logging.Logger LOGGER 
      private WindowPatternCard windowboard
      Window Pattern Card assigned to this player board It was chosen at the beginning of the game by the player There is no setter for this attribute, as it is given in the constructor

      Main constructor of the Player Board class It needs a color and a Window Pattern card

      Method used to check if there are orthogonal restrictions to the passed dice in the passed position If the check of the startingRow and the startingCol is not required the passed value is the default -3.

      • checkIfDicesAround

        public boolean checkIfDicesAround(int finalRow,
                                  int finalCol,
                                  int startRow,
                                  int startCol)
        Method used to check if there are dices around the place identified by row and col
        Parameters:
        finalRow - final row of the move
        finalCol - final col of the move
        startRow - starting row of the move
        startCol - starting col of the move
        Returns:
        a boolean value

      • checkIfOrthogonalIgnoreSelf

        public boolean checkIfOrthogonalIgnoreSelf(Dice dice,
                                           int finalRow,
                                           int finalCol,
                                           int startingRow,
                                           int startingCol)
        Method used to check if there are orthogonal restrictions to the passed dice in the passed position

        If the check of the startingRow and the startingCol is not required the passed value is the default -3. In that case the internal if conditions are bypassed

        Parameters:
        dice - dice to be placed
        finalRow - row passed of the final position
        finalCol - col passed of the final position
        startingRow - row of the initial position of the dice
        startingCol - col of the initial position of the dice
        Returns:
        a boolean value to check the orthogonal control

      • whiteSpace

        public int whiteSpace()
        Method used for counting the number of white cells without dices in the window board It is used only at the end of game for calculate player points
        Returns:
        number of white cells without dices
